HeroInfo.phrase: we help you to become the best version of yourself

About.title: Dias Clinic
description: At Dias Clinic, we offer cutting-edge facial and body treatments. Explore our array of procedures, from the innovative EMS Body Sculp to the proven efficacy of Radio Frequency, Pressotherapy, Lipo Laser, and Lymphatic Drainage Massage. Our mission is to deliver transformative results with the help of treatments such as: cellulite removal, Mesotherapy and fat dissolving injection.

To enhance facial beauty, we present exclusive treatments such as PRX, Profhilo Biorevitalization, Radio Frequency, HydraFacial, and specialised acne treatments. Uncover skin perfection with our deep facial cleaning services, Dermapen, and Dermaplaning.

Winner.title: Dias Clinic Honored as Top Rated Aesthetic Destination
Winner.description: Welcome to Dias Clinic, your excellence in aesthetics nestled in the heart of Notting Hill! With three years dedicated to enhancing beauty and well-being, we have proudly earned the title of the top-rated clinic for the prestigious years of 2021, 2022, and 2023, solidifying our reputation with impeccable five-star reviews.

Location.title: DIAS CLINIC
Location.description: Your Prime Destination for Transformative Beauty in the Heart of Notting Hill. Elevate your aesthetics with cutting-edge treatments and three years of excellence. Welcome to a sanctuary of beauty and rejuvenation!

CONSULTATION.description: Comprehensive consultation session to assess needs and provide personalized recommendations.

Feedbacks.name: Edward
Feedbacks.feedback: I'm beyond grateful for the Facial at this Clinic! I was not a big fan of treatments but it’s worth it consequently I’ll be back next month.

Feedbacks.name: Anna
Feedbacks.feedback: Lovely people there and had a wonderful experience.

Feedbacks.name: Marta
Feedbacks.feedback: Lovely energy and always great service. Highly recommend.

Feedbacks.name: Paul
Feedbacks.feedback: The way the staffs treated me was great and the treatment was really nice.
